Package com.bricomaniaco.ticketappserver.repositories

Class MongoDBUserRep

java.lang.Object
com.bricomaniaco.ticketappserver.repositories.MongoDBUserRep
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserRepository
@Repository public class MongoDBUserRep extends Object implements UserRepository
Repository for managing User entities in MongoDB.
